name: FURIOUS RACING
description:
Hey i m jagad ... If u like thrill endless car chase adrenal rush game u r in the right place 

This game is in tribute to scuderia ferarri's 70 seasons in F1

That y the car is made red

This Game also very simple UI interface with a very clean touch

Hope You like the game Follow me if u did so that u dont miss out on any fun and good games by me :)
